title: mris_smooth_intracortical
description: Smooths data overlaid onto cortical surface meshes using specified tangential and radial extents.

surf_name.title: Surface Name
surf_name.description: Name of a surface file(s). Use * and ? to pass multiple names (max 20).

overlay_name.title: Overlay Name
overlay_name.description: Name of an overlay file(s). Use * and ? to pass multiple names (max 20).

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: Path to the output directory. Default is same as overlay directory.

output_name.title: Output Name
output_name.description: Name of the output overlay file.

tan_size.title: Tangential Size
tan_size.description: Tangential extent of the smoothing kernel. Default = 0, Max = 6.

rad_size.title: Radial Size
rad_size.description: Radial extent of the intracortical smoothing kernel.

rad_start.title: Radial Start
rad_start.description: Starting surface mesh of the intracortical smoothing kernel in the radial direction.

tan_weights.title: Tangential Weights
tan_weights.description: Weighting function for tangential smoothing. 'gauss' or 'distance'.
